name: asposecloudsdk
summary: This SDK allows you to use Aspose Cloud APIs in your application quickly and easily.
description: This SDK makes it easy for iOS developers to work with Microsoft Word documents, Microsoft Excel spreadsheets, Microsoft PowerPoint presentations, Adobe PDFs, OpenDocument formats, barcodes, OCR and email formats and protocols in their apps. This SDK lets you support many common document processing and management tasks: document assembly, mail merge, reporting, file conversion, text and image extraction, metadata removal, barcode generation and recognition, email tracking and creation, targeting content to different devices.
